short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to find downloadable files on website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding downloadable files on a website can often be a tedious and time-consuming task. EasyFile Search simplifies this process by quickly identifying and listing all downloadable files available on any webpage. Whether you're looking for PDFs, images, videos, or other file types, this extension ensures you get what you need without the hassle.

Key Features:
Simple Filtering: Use the easy-to-use filter option to specify the type of file you're looking for (e.g., ".pdf"). This helps you find relevant files faster.
User-Friendly Interface: The extension features a clean, intuitive design with clear labels and icons, making it accessible for users of all levels.
Direct Downloads: Once files are found, download them directly from the extension without needing to navigate through multiple pages.
